excursions.title: Hel Peninsula
excursions.description:
Discover the end of Poland on a full-day sightseeing tour of the Hel Peninsula, a magnificent sandbar that juts out into the open Baltic Sea.

This Polish Land`s End is an enchanting environment of white sand beaches, traditional fishermen`s houses and cozy bars, where you will have an opportunity to sample some typical Kashubian specialties.

excursions.title: Bieszczady Mountains
excursions.description: Bieszczady is a mountain range that runs from the extreme south-east of Poland and north-east of Slovakia through to western Ukraine. Enjoy nature at it's best. A week long trip.

excursions.title: Malbork Castle Tour
excursions.description: Discover the Castle of the Teutonic Order in Malbork, one of the greatest monuments in Poland and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Learn about the history of the Teutonic Order and explore one of the largest gothic castle in the world.
